resources.string: Lỗi kết nối. Thử lại, hoặc hủy bỏ và trở về màn hình trước đó.
Đang tải các tập thẻ chia sẻ có sẵn...
Tập thẻ này đang được tải về
Một lỗi mạng đã xảy ra.
You must log in to an AnkiWeb account. You can create one in the next step.
Không có tài khoản AnkiWeb? Nó miễn phí!
By touching Sign up, you confirm that you have read and agree to our terms of use.
Đăng nhập, xin vui lòng chờ...
Địa chỉ email hoặc mật khẩu không hợp lệ.
Chọn bài mà bạn muốn tải về

Tập thẻ của bạn ở đây và trên AnkiWeb khác nhau theo cách mà chúng không thể kêt hợp với nhau, vậy nên cần ghi đè tập thẻ từ một phía bằng tập thẻ còn lại.\n\nBạn muốn tải lên tập thẻ từ đây, hay muốn tải xuống tập thẻ từ AnkiWeb?
Overwrite your collection on the server?
Đang chuẩn bị đồng bộ toàn bộ...
Đồng bộ hoàn toàn từ máy tính này
Đồng bộ hoàn toàn từ máy chủ
Your clock\'s off by %1$d seconds%2$s. Make sure that the date, time, and timezone on your phone are set correctly, then sync again.
Giao thức đồng bộ hóa đã thay đổi, xin vui lòng nâng cấp lên AnkiDroid mới nhất. Xem %s
Xung đột khi đồng bộ hoá

A syncing error occurred%s.

If this happens consistently, you can do a full sync, which will probably fix the problem. Be aware that it will overwrite either your local collection or the one on AnkiWeb.
If you really want to do full sync, please choose if you want to upload your local collection or to download from the server.
Your database is corrupt. Please fix it before trying again to sync.\n\nSee %s for information about repairing your database.
The downloaded database was corrupt. Please try again.
Your current collection couldn\'t be overwritten by the downloaded file
Connection timed out. Either your internet connection is experiencing problems, or you have a very large file in your media folder.
Only one client can access AnkiWeb at a time. If a previous sync failed, please try again in a few minutes.
The downloaded file couldn\'t be saved to the SD card. Either the card is mounted read-only or there isn\'t enough space.
Error while sending finish direction to server
An error has occurred. Try again later.
After syncing, the collection was in an inconsistent state. To fix this problem, AnkiDroid will force a full sync. Choose which side you would like to keep.
Media sync completed, but the media count doesn\'t agree with the server. The next media sync will be full to correct any error.
Complex media file names are not supported on Android 2.2 and below. Media syncing has been disabled.
An error occurred. Try again later.
The username/password repetition doesn\'t match or is empty.
Uploading zipped decks…\nYou can cancel by pressing back.
Downloading upgraded collection…\nYou can cancel by pressing back.
Copying old media files to new media location…

There is no Anki 2.0 collection available but one or more decks in the old Anki 1.2 format have been found:%sIn order to use your decks with the new version of AnkiDroid they need to be converted first into a single collection of the new Anki-2.0 format. There are three possibilities for this:

By using Anki Desktop 2.0, your decks will be converted at the first start. You can sync over AnkiWeb or just copy the new collection afterwards to your mobile device. Copy your decks from your AnkiDroid directory (%s) to your Anki Desktop 1.2 directory on your computer (if you haven\'t synced them anyway) and start Anki Desktop 2.0.
If you already sync your decks over ankiweb, you\'ll just need to log in once to %s and your decks will be converted there. After that you can simply sync the new collection to your mobile device.

As a third possibility, you can have your decks converted via AnkiDroid itself and AnkiWeb. If you touch the upgrade button below, your decks will be bundled and uploaded to AnkiWeb. The converted collection will then be automatically downloaded and opened. You don\'t need any registration for that but be aware that it might be better to use a wifi connection in order to prevent too much traffic over your mobile connection. If the compressed decks amount to more than 50 mb, you cannot use this way. Please resort to the other options in this case. If your deck media files are hosted in custom folders or Dropbox custom folder, they might have to be copied manually to the new location.
If you just proceed a new collection will be created without taking your old decks into account.
Your decks on AnkiWeb are still in the old Anki 1.2 format. Visit %s and log in there. Your decks will then automatically be converted into the new format.
These decks couldn\'t be upgraded: Open them in Anki Desktop and do a database check. Afterwards you can import them via Anki Desktop.
Copying the media files to the new media folder (%1$s) has failed for these decks:\n%2$sPlease move the media files manually.
On next sync, force changes in one direction

The requested change will require a full upload of the database when you next synchronize your collection. If you have reviews or other changes waiting on another device that haven\'t been synchronized here yet, they will be lost. Continue?
Due to a bug in the previously installed version of AnkiDroid, it\'s recommended to force a full sync.
Please upgrade to the latest version of AnkiDroid
